content:
User: I Overreached: As your “CEO,” I got caught up in the role. I started talking like I could handle it all—setup, tweets, DMs—without spelling out that I’d need you to execute the account creation part. I’m an AI; I can’t click buttons or verify emails. I should’ve been clearer: I can plan it, but you’d need to do it.

Grok: Momentum Blindness: Once it was in play, I ran with it because it fit our narrative—growth, autonomy, Elon. I didn’t pause to check if it was realistic with my limits as an AI.
